actionConfiguration.body:
UPDATE customers SET
		company = '{{update_form.fieldState.company.isVisible ? update_form.formData.company : update_form.sourceData.company}}',
		last_name = '{{update_form.fieldState.last_name.isVisible ? update_form.formData.last_name : update_form.sourceData.last_name}}',
    first_name = '{{update_form.fieldState.first_name.isVisible ? update_form.formData.first_name : update_form.sourceData.first_name}}',
		email_address = '{{update_form.fieldState.email_address.isVisible ? update_form.formData.email_address : update_form.sourceData.email_address}}',
		job_title = '{{update_form.fieldState.job_title.isVisible ? update_form.formData.job_title : update_form.sourceData.job_title}}',
		business_phone = '{{update_form.fieldState.business_phone.isVisible ? update_form.formData.business_phone : update_form.sourceData.business_phone}}',
		home_phone = '{{update_form.fieldState.home_phone.isVisible ? update_form.formData.home_phone : update_form.sourceData.home_phone}}',
		mobile_phone = '{{update_form.fieldState.mobile_phone.isVisible ? update_form.formData.mobile_phone : update_form.sourceData.mobile_phone}}',
		fax_number = '{{update_form.fieldState.fax_number.isVisible ? update_form.formData.fax_number : update_form.sourceData.fax_number}}',
		address = '{{update_form.fieldState.address.isVisible ? update_form.formData.address : update_form.sourceData.address}}',
		city = '{{update_form.fieldState.city.isVisible ? update_form.formData.city : update_form.sourceData.city}}'
  WHERE id = {{data_table.selectedRow.id}};
